mapper.select: SELECT b.mkboard_Num, MAX(b.TITLE) AS TITLE, MAX(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(b.CONTENT, 4000, 1)) AS CONTENT, MAX(b.CATEGORY) AS CATEGORY, MAX(b.MAKERIDX) AS MAKERIDX, MAX(maker.makername) AS name, NVL(COUNT(l.MEMBERIDX), 0) AS likeCount FROM MakerBoard b LEFT JOIN MakerBoardLike l ON b.mkboard_Num = l.mkboard_Num LEFT JOIN Maker maker ON b.MAKERIDX = maker.memberIdx WHERE b.MAKERIDX = #{makerIdx, jdbcType=NUMERIC} GROUP BY b.mkboard_Num ORDER BY b.mkboard_Num DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MakerBoardLike (MEMBERIDX, mkboard_Num) VALUES (#{memberIdx, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{num, jdbcType=NUMERIC})
